movies.title: Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi
movies.originalTitle: Torrente, el brazo tonto de la ley
movies.plot: Torrente is a lazy, rude, drunkard, sexist, racist, extreme-right-wing Madrid cop; a despicable character who only cares about himself. He lives in a decrepit slum with his wheelchair-bound father, whom he treats quite badly. One day, a new family of neighbours move in, and the sexy younger daughter, Amparito, catches his eye, so he becomes a friend of Rafi, her nerdy brother, to get closer to her. At the same time, he discovers that a band of drug traffickers are operating in a nearby chinese restaurant; he knows that if he cracks this case, it could make him regain the status he lost within the police department; but the only people he can count on to help him are Rafi and his equally nerdy friends.
movies.simplePlot: José Luis Torrente, a former policeman fights against the oriental mafia in Madrid.

biography.bio: Born in Madrid, Santiago Segura started his career by making his first short movie at the age of fourteen. After studying Arts in Madrid, he finally decided to become a filmmaker. His first short film Relatos de la medianoche (1989) was made with a budget of only 7.000 pts. (about 60 dollars). After that, he appeared as a contestant in several Spanish TV quiz shows, such as Locos por la tele (1990) and No te rías, que es peor (1990). With the money he made of those appareances, he directed Evilio. (1992) and shortly after, Perturbado (1993), winning a Goya for the best short film in 1994. His last short film is the sequel Evilio vuelve (El purificador) (1994). He's a very good friend of the Spanish director Álex de la Iglesia and he has appeared in all of his films. In 1998, he directed his firt feature film, the smashing hit Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998).
biography.name: Santiago Segura

biography.placeOfBirth: Albelda de Iregua, La Rioja, Spain
biography.bio: Born in La Rioja (Spain) in 1967. Soon he moved to Madrid to graduate in Dramatic Arts. He use to work as an usher at the Fígaro Theatre in Madrid. His stage debut was in "El caballero de Olmedo" by Félix Lope de Vega back in 1991. After his great success in the TV-sitcom 7 vidas (1999), he worked with Pedro Almodóvar in the acclaimed Talk to Her (2002).
biography.name: Javier Cámara

biography.birthName: María de los Ángeles Asensio Liñán
biography.bio: Neus Asensi was born on August 4, 1965 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as María de los Ángeles Asensio Liñán. She is an actress, known for Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998), Le coeur du guerrier (1999) and La fille de tes rêves (1998).
biography.name: Neus Asensi

biography.bio: Chus Lampreave was born on December 11, 1930 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as María Jesús Lampreave. She was an actress, known for Volver (2006), Talk to Her (2002) and Broken Embraces (2009). She was married to Eusebio Moreno de los Ríos. She died on April 4, 2016 in Almería, Almería, Andalucía, Spain.
biography.name: Chus Lampreave

biography.bio: This actor started learning singing and dancing. Then he had very different occupations, including boxing, and even become to be the light weight amateur champion of Castilla, Spain. Later he entered the theatre, acting in the companies of Nati Mistral and and Celia Gámez. His entry in cinema was with little and secondary roles (Los últimos de Filipinas (1945) was his first film), many of them as what in spanish is said to be the 'chulo madrileño' (the typical classic Madrid city man, with his genuine verbal accent and special behaviour). With this type of roles he got great success in the 50's. Once he had become a known actor, he started his career as director and producer. He created his own production company and produced three films, but had no success at all with it and the company went to bankrupt. Finally, he decided to continue as an actor. In 1993 he was paid reverence in the Goya Awards Ceremony for his whole career.
biography.name: Tony Leblanc

biography.bio: Julio Sanjuán is an actor, known for Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998), Kárate a muerte en Torremolinos (2003) and Torrente 2: Mission in Marbella (2001).
biography.name: Julio Sanjuán

biography.bio: Jimmy Barnatán was born on July 2, 1981 in Madrid, Spain as Jaime Barnatán Pereda. He is an actor, known for La famille Serrano (2003), Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998) and Frisson (2008).
biography.name: Jimmy Barnatán

biography.bio: Darío Paso was born on September 10, 1979 in Madrid, Spain as Darío Paso-Jardiel Sánchez. He is an actor and director, known for Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998), Tapas (2005) and Mensaka (1998).
biography.name: Darío Paso

biography.bio: Carlos Perea was an actor and production manager, known for Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998), Action mutante (1993) and My Elena (2009). He died in 2009 in Spain.
biography.name: Carlos Perea

biography.birthName: Manuel Juan Francisco del Cristo de la Victoria Prieto Comesaña
biography.bio: Manuel Manquiña was born on August 2, 1953 in Vigo, Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain as Manuel Juan Francisco del Cristo de la Victoria Prieto Comesaña. He is an actor and producer, known for Era visto (2011), Airbag (1997) and Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998).
biography.name: Manuel Manquiña

biography.bio: Espartaco Santoni was born on June 14, 1932 in Carúpano, Venezuela as Espartaco Garibaldi Borga Santoni. He was an actor and producer, known for The Castilian (1963), Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998) and Feast of Satan (1971). He was married to Eva Medina, Carmen Cervera, Marujita Díaz, Carolina Zapata, Maruja Valdez, Nati de las Casas and Tere Velázquez. He died on September 3, 1998 in Marbella, Málaga, Andalucía, Spain.
biography.name: Espartaco Santoni

biography.bio: Antonio de la Torre was born on January 18, 1968 in Málaga, Málaga, Andalucía, Spain as Antonio de la Torre Martín. He is an actor, known for Volver (2006), The Last Circus (2010) and The Fury of a Patient Man (2016).
biography.name: Antonio de la Torre

biography.bio: Javier Jurdao is an actor and writer, known for El Crimen Perfecto (The Perfect Crime) (2004), Torrente, le bras gauche de la loi (1998) and Common Wealth (2000).
biography.name: Javier Jurdao

biography.bio: Carlos Bardem was born on March 7, 1963 in Madrid, Spain as Carlos Encinas Bardem. He is an actor and writer, known for Cellule 211 (2009), Assassin's Creed (2016) and Días de gracia (2011).
biography.name: Carlos Bardem

biography.bio: César Vea was born in Logroño, La Rioja, Spain. He is an actor, known for Pan's Labyrinth (2006), Tierra (1996) and La torre de Suso (2007).
biography.name: César Vea

categories.category: Best Movie Actor (Mejor Actor de Cine)
Best Supporting Actor (Mejor Actor de Reparto)
